name: Free Online Article Rewriter
author: Prepostseo

sections.description:
Free Article Rewriter plugin is specialy designed for wordpress users, so that they can rewrite copy paste content directly from their admin panel.
It is Very fast because it not use any resources from your website. It send your words to prepostseo.com and display you an rewritten content. we also have online article rewriter tool available at prepostseo.com

Bug Reports
Bug reports for Free online article rewriter are welcomed on Prepostseo.com.

How this plugin works

Under the Visual text editor, their will textarea input. Click on the Blue button “Get Post Text (Plain Text)” and you content will be copied to the clipboard. Paste that content in the input box below and click on rewrite button.

More tools available.
To check if you content is 100% unique after rewriting your content, you can use Plagiarism Checker tool to do this job for you. it will show how much your text is unique and how much it is plagiarized

if you are facing any issue regarding our free article rewriter please contact us. and we will try to solve your issue ASAP. Article Spinners allows users to write web post quickly. Because you have to write posts on daily basis. So this tool is very useful for ranking purpose.
sections.installation:
1. Upload free-online-article-rewiter folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Free Online Article Rewriter, allows you to rewrite your content directly from your admin panel.
